channel.title: Making Free Forums for (GOOD CODERS ONLY)
channel.description:
Hey its HHC, I can make you a forum using my hoster, with the choice of (phpbb2 or SMF). _______________________________________ Your domian will look like this: [URL=http://"Runecoded.net/YOURFORUMHERE"]Runecoded.net/YOURFORUMHERE[/URL] or [URL=http://"YOUFORUMNAME.Runecoded.net"]YOURFORUMNAME.Runecoded.net[/URL] _______________________________________ These Slots are open to Coders that are good at coding only. If you do meet the qualifications of having a good server, I will make you a forum in 2 mins or less. Then I will add in ShoutBox and Other Mods the next day. _______________________________________ There is 3 slots open: 1. 2. 3. _____________________________ My Host also has a serverstatus at your need and will have a webclient very soon for you also. If you wish to use James's tut for intergrating on the phpbb, you are welcome to do so. If you need to I cannot give you the password, but i may give you the shared ip and mysql database password and user. ____________________________________________________________________________ I Also Have 3 Already Cool Themes ______________________________ I am signing up for more bandwithd next week so please be paitent if you didnt get a slot.
HAPPY CODING, HHC
Also, When I get the first 2 slots done, I will take out the forum on the main domain: Runecoded.net and add in a index page advertising your page.
Add me on MSN at: [email]thefagexhhc@hotmail.com[/email

item.title: Making Free Forums for (GOOD CODERS ONLY)
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

Don’t be fooled… Go to google.com and search in phbmm or w\e, then go to www.dot.tk Free domains. use the website you made for the dot.tk thing, and then you will have a www.______.tk

Read full topic

item.title: Making Free Forums for (GOOD CODERS ONLY)
item.dc:creator: @HHC HHC
item.description:
@HHC wrote:

Hey its HHC, I can make you a forum using my hoster, with the choice of (phpbb2 or SMF).

Your domian will look like this: Runecoded.net/YOURFORUMHERE or YOURFORUMNAME.Runecoded.net

These Slots are open to Coders that are good at coding only.
If you do meet the qualifications of having a good server, I will make you a forum in 2 mins or less. Then I will add in ShoutBox and Other Mods the next day.

There is 3 slots open:
1.
2.
3.

My Host also has a serverstatus at your need and will have a webclient very soon for you also.
If you wish to use James’s tut for intergrating on the phpbb, you are welcome to do so.
If you need to I cannot give you the password, but i may give you the shared ip and mysql database password and user.

I Also Have 3 Already Cool Themes

I am signing up for more bandwithd next week so please be paitent if you didnt get a slot.

HAPPY CODING, HHC

Also, When I get the first 2 slots done, I will take out the forum on the main domain: Runecoded.net and add in a index page advertising your page.

Add me on MSN at: [email]thefagexhhc@hotmail.com[/email
